  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CNIScanner
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface CNIScanController
    Author: konstantin Date: 03.08.17.

      boolean isScanning()
      Returns whether beacons ranging is started or not

      Starts beacon ranging.
      void stopScanning()
